abstract: The unmodified sum of the durations of all samples in the sample buffer.
overview:
## Discussion

If the buffer contains out-of-presentation-order samples, any gaps in the presentation timeline are not represented in the returned duration. The calculated duration is simply the sum of all the individual sample durations.

Returns [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid] if `sampleTimings` is empty or contains invalid [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleTimingInfo/duration].

# duration

**Instance Property**

The unmodified sum of the durations of all samples in the sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

If the buffer contains out-of-presentation-order samples, any gaps in the presentation timeline are not represented in the returned duration. The calculated duration is simply the sum of all the individual sample durations.

Returns [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid] if `sampleTimings` is empty or contains invalid [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleTimingInfo/duration].
title: duration
